idea: Wrapotex International Private Limited” are a leading Manufacturer And Supplier of a wide range of Pond Liner, HDPE And PVC Tarpaulin, Biofloc Fish Farming Tank, etc. Our In depth experience in the polymer sector has enabled us to manufacture highly technical products ranging from PP Woven Sacks To HDPE Geomembranes. We provide cost-effective packaging solutions designed to meet the industry specific needs of the clients.
name: WRAPOTEX INTERNATIONAL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We work with small factories to make them export ready. We work with brands across the world to source the best quality products with an on time delivery guarantee.

Our goal is to be the biggest global factory which works with transparency and delivers the best quality products.
name: UPGRIT TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We would like to take this opportunity to introduce our company running under the name and style “BHAVAANI INNOVATIONS LLP”, an established and popular company with an excellent track record for the best customer satisfaction, as we have never compromised on the Quality and the services provided to the customer, this opportunity in adding our company to your list of approved suppliers for your consideration.

Here is a short introduction about our company “BHAVAANI INNOVATIONS LLP”, which is one of the youngest and fastest growing company in the field of Supply and Export of Steel Products.

Bhavaani Innovations LLP is backed by its Parent Company “Vaishnavi Enterprises”, a well-established brand for 3 decades. We are the Stockist, Suppliers, Wholesaler and Exporter of Steel, Ferrous and Non- ferrous metals, and other structural items like Pipes, Pipe fittings, TMT Bars, Electric Resistance Welded/Cold Drawn Welded pipes, Ductile Iron Pipes, Hose Pipes, Flat, Sheet, Plate, etc... As per IS/API/DIN/BS and other applicable quality standards.

We offer our esteemed clients the customized length as per their project requirements, which leads to customer satisfaction. We offer convenient, customized and just-in-time service at your doorsteps.

We are established company primarily dealing in all Industrial Ferrous and Non-Ferrous material required in core industries like Oil and Gas, Construction and Plant Equipment, Defence and Military, Marine and Offshore, Power Sector, Refinery, Fertilizer, etc. We have a huge stock of Pipe and Pipe Fitting, also, are one of the leading suppliers and exporters.

Our Parent Company Vaishnavi Enterprises were involved in the supply of material and fabrication of two Metro Station in Mumbai under MMRDA, Namely Ghatkopar and DN Nagar (Andheri).
name: BHAVAANI INNOVATIONS LLP

idea:
Aapka CFO we are the most Affordable  Technology Platform available to address your most critical business priorities. 

 The Duties shall include:

1. Understanding cost-efficient tax structure

2. Cost and Revenue Management

3. Working Capital Management

4. Prepare the Organisation for Fund raising

5. Support to manage cash growth and profitability

6. Support on commercial decision making

7. Company Budgeting

8. Representing on behalf of company with the bankers.

Aapka CFO, launches worlds first affordable diversified financial services targeted towards MSME, SME and Start-ups. They provide business services like road mapping, all types of fundraising, business cost management, revenue management, working capital management, support on commercial decision making, assisting to manage cash growth and profitability along with budgeting and accounting.

Staying true to its main objective of “Dhanda Aap Dekho Baki Sab Hum Dekhenge” gives organizations more power to lead towards their goals. A company with a vision of providing opportunity for all businesses and making its services affordable to all.
name: AAPKA SOLUTIONS CFO PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: HugMe.Fashion rolls out its exclusive line of leather articles through series of retail stores, both online and offline. While online store caters to the customers pan India, offline stores called HugMe Leather Café are concentrated in the financial capital of the country, Mumbai along with Pune. We have extensive plans of expanding through franchises module across metros cities.
name: Hugme Fashion

idea: We help organisations in Ad Marketing and Printing solutions
name: SOURABH ADS MARKETING AND PRINTING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Madhubala would be the world's first Bar only for girl, bar’s employees would be all girls. Bar would have taxi service driven by woman only. Overall, Bar where Girl feels safe and enjoys with no hesitation. Madhubala would give parents a confident to send their daughter to Bar (Madhubala).

idea: Preserving the Diversity in Indian Regional Cuisine
